painting.menagerie.ether.title: Ether

enchantment.menagerie.arcane.desc: Coverts all weapon damage into Magic damage
enchantment.menagerie.pogo.desc: Replaces the Spoon's smash attack with a pogo ability. Throws you the opposite way of the direction you are looking
death.attack.arcane.item: %1$s was obliterated by magic from %2$s wielding %3$s
